title: Coca-Cola Company 's net operating revenues worldwide 2007 to 2019
summary: This is a line chart with an x axis representing Year and a y axis representing Revenues in billion U.S. dollars, containing a total of 13 data points.
Overall Revenues in billion U.S. dollars has increased over the Year.
The steepest increase occurs in between the Year 2010 and 2011.
Maximum Revenues in billion U.S. dollars, about 48.02 was reported at Year 2012
The lowest Revenues in billion U.S. dollars, of value 28.86 was reported at Year 2007
